EmailTemplate.name: Change Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.RecordType} - Change Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We have researched your change case number {!Case.CaseNumber} and we are not able to accommodate this request. Please review the below information for further details.
Thank you,
Beam Suntory Customer Service
{!Case.Thread_Id}
